knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
#Sourcing storm_runoff.R so we can use the predict_runoff() function 

source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))

```

```{r}
#Use function to estimate storm water volume for a watershed of 182 acres over a range of estimates for the impervious fraction (0.6 to 0.8, by 0.01)

Ia_seq <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

resulting_runoff <- predict_runoff(Ia_seq, 182)

resulting_dataframe <- data.frame(resulting_runoff)


ggplot(data = resulting_dataframe, 
       aes(x))

```
